Data Fields
Vps_CaptDssWbOutInfo Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Capture API » VPS DSSWB Capture API

Capture output format information. More...

#include <vps_captureDssWb.h>

Data Fields

Fvid2_Format outFmt
 
UInt32 memType
 
UInt32 scEnable
 
UInt32 cscFullRngEnable
 
UInt32 cropEnable
 
Vps_DssDispcAdvDmaConfig * advDmaCfg
 

Detailed Description

Capture output format information.

Field Documentation

Vps_DssDispcAdvDmaConfig* Vps_CaptDssWbOutInfo::advDmaCfg

Advanced DMA Configuration structure. For default values pass NULL

UInt32 Vps_CaptDssWbOutInfo::cropEnable

Set to true if inFmt.width and inCropCfg.cropWidth are not same and inFmt.height and inCropHeight.cropHeight are not same Not applicable for tda2xx

UInt32 Vps_CaptDssWbOutInfo::cscFullRngEnable

TRUE: Use CSC Full Range , FALSE: Limited Range CSC is used.

UInt32 Vps_CaptDssWbOutInfo::memType

Tiled or non-tiled memory selection for output. For valid values see Vps_VpdmaMemoryType. NON_TILED is not supported for both TDA2XX and TDA3XX .

Fvid2_Format Vps_CaptDssWbOutInfo::outFmt

width:
Output width, in pixels. This represents the scaler output width to be programmed if scaler is used. Otherwise output width is equal to the inCrop source width of the overlay in case of TDA3XX.In case of TDA2XX it is equal to Overlay Width if scaler is not used

height:
Output height, in lines. This represents the scaler output Height to be programmed if scaler is used. Otherwise output width is equal to the inCrop source height of the overlay in case of TDA3XX. In case of TDA2XX it's equal to Overlay Height if scaler is not used

dataFormat:
Output Data format, valid options for TDA3XX are
FVID2_DF_BGRA16_4444,
FVID2_DF_RGBA16_4444,
FVID2_DF_ABGR16_4444,
FVID2_DF_BGR16_565,
FVID2_DF_RGB16_565,
FVID2_DF_BGRA16_1555,
FVID2_DF_RGBA16_1555,
FVID2_DF_RGBA32_8888,
FVID2_DF_BGRA32_8888,
FVID2_DF_ABGR32_8888,
FVID2_DF_ARGB32_8888,
FVID2_DF_BGR24P_888,
FVID2_DF_BGRA64_16161616,
FVID2_DF_ABGR64_16161616,
FVID2_DF_BGRX16_4444,
FVID2_DF_RGBA16_4444,
FVID2_DF_ABGR16_4444,
FVID2_DF_BGRX16_5551,
FVID2_DF_RGBX16_5551,
FVID2_DF_BGRX32_8888,
FVID2_DF_RGBX32_8888,
FVID2_DF_XBGR32_8888,
FVID2_DF_XRGB32_8888,
FVID2_DF_BGRX64_16161616,
FVID2_DF_XBGR64_16161616,
FVID2_DF_YUV420SP_UV,
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV,
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_UYVY.
Output Data format, valid options for TDA2XX are
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_UYVY,
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV,
FVID2_DF_YUV420SP_UV,
FVID2_DF_BGR24_888,
FVID2_DF_XBGR_4444,
FVID2_DF_BGRX_4444,
FVID2_DF_BGRA16_4444,
FVID2_DF_ABGR16_4444,
FVID2_DF_BGRX16_5551,
FVID2_DF_BGRA16_5551,
FVID2_DF_BGR16_565,
FVID2_DF_BGRX24_8888,
FVID2_DF_XBGR24_8888,
FVID2_DF_BGRA32_8888,
FVID2_DF_ABGR32_8888,
FVID2_DF_ARGB32_8888.
For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat.

pitch:
Pitch in bytes between two lines.It should be (BPP * Width) No other value is supported. And should be aligned to VPS_BUFFER_ALIGNMENT.

fieldMerged:
Valid only in case of FVID2_BUF_FMT_FRAME buffer format and interlaced capture mode.
TRUE - Fields are merged. Driver programs difference between each line as pitch * 2. Application has to provide bottom field address as top field address + pitch (next line). FALSE - Fields are separated. Driver programs difference between each line as pitch * 1 only. Top and bottom field buffers could be in entirely different buffer location.

chNum, scanFormat, bpp: Not used, set to 0 or default.

UInt32 Vps_CaptDssWbOutInfo::scEnable

TRUE: Use scaler before writing video data to memory, FALSE: Scaler is not used in capture path.
